description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cueol","text":"This step-by-step protocol describes the cDNA synthesis, primer pools preparation and multiplex PCR conditions with the main goal to sequence the complete genome of CHIKV serotype strains.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"9a258","text":"Machado, Lais Ceschini, et al. “Genome Sequencing Reveals Coinfection by Multiple Chikungunya Virus Genotypes in a Recent Outbreak in Brazil.” PLOS Neglected Tropical Diseases, edited by Fabrice Simon, vol. 13, no. 5, May 2019, p. e0007332, doi:https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pntd.0007332.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cj0p8","text":"Reverse transcription: SuperScript™ IV First-Strand Synthesis System. (200 reactions) Cat:18091200 Invitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87s2s","text":"\nMultiplex PCR: Q5® High-Fidelity 2X Master Mix. Cat: M0492L NEB, H20 Ultre Pure, primers described in table 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"7f1on","text":"Using a 2mL tube prepare the Mix 1 described below for 96 samples:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bek1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59r5q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gapk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cioc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["Mix 1

{"blocks":[{"key":"6t9ja","text":"Using 0,2mL PCR tubes or 96 wells plates add 11-16µL of extracted RNA from\nRT-PCR positive samples. Add 2µL of Mix 1 to the tube/well and take it to the\nthermocycler with the following set up:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":104,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":111,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"docoh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f03b1","text":"65ºC ---- 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gljb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7a42","text":"Take the tubes/wells to ice for 1 minute. (you can prepare a water bath with ice cubes to have a uniform temperature distribution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2km9o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k4h2","text":" Add 7µL of Mix 2 to the tubes containing the Mix 1 plus RNA and take it to the thermocycler following the set up below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe9hi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h3au","text":"Step1:
42ºC ---- 50 minutes
70ºC ---- 10 minutes
4ºC ---- Hold","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bmnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahbi9","text":"Store the cDNA at -20ºC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8etqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9ho8","text":"Observation:. As a suggestion, to improve the final results only samples RT-PCR positive showing a Ct value of \u003c 30 should be used for cDNA conversion and genomic amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a61ta","text":"Using the original 100uM primer solution eluted individually, put them together following the table below containing each primer volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6o73b","text":"Pool 1 will have a final volume of 469µl and pool 2 of 460µl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j65v","text":"In order to prepare the solution to use in the Multiplex PCR, dilute each pool 1:10. That is, 10µl of pool 1 and 90µl of ultrapure water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3icd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uvtg","text":"TABLE 1: Primers and pool order","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dlii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt06q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajbdk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1agkt","text":"*approximate concentration of each primer in the 25µl PCR reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asucr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"149g8","text":"Note: The primers were designed using the https://primalscheme.com based on the

{"blocks":[{"key":"44vf2","text":"Add 2,5µl of cDNA (totalling 5µl) in 22,5µl of the pool1 and pool2 reaction and take
it to the thermocycler following the conditions bellow:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3htbk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"js85","text":"Step1:
98ºC ---- 30 seconds
Step2: (45 cycles)
98ºC ---- 15 seconds
58ºC ---- 30 seconds
72ºC ---- 5 minutes
Step3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"huvv","text":"72ºC ---- 2 minutes
Hold 4ºC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
